page.title: 06POST OFFICE HATHERDEN.
page.content: Mrs Ingold, the owner of the post office, has lived in Hatherden for 13 years.She has owned the post office 9 years.She opens at 9 and closes at 5:30 with an hour off for lunch. She is open every day of the week except Tuesday.The unusual thing about this post office is that it is in the entrance hall of her semi_detached house.The counter is across her entrance hall and you just walk in through her front door.Mrs Ingold's daughter Nicola, who is 17,sometimes works in the post office to give her mother a break. They have to be very careful over security and have a burglar alarm,locks on all windows,a Belgian shepherd guard dog and an emergency telephone number.What brought her to work in the post office was that she could work at home while her children were at school.
